There is also a computer game, Torment: Tides of Numenera
Numenera are basically a 1 shot magic item that causes problems if you have too many. It is from the Numenera RPG system from Monte Cook!
is the video game any good?
It's an rpg like D&D where players explore through the ruins of eight previous high tech civilizations, themselves at a medieval tech. Yeah, the video game was licensed from MCG.
The video game is quite good IMO
It's Baldur's Gate/Pillars of Eternity style gameplay, so if you like those, yeah it's good.
@TheWaveintheDark Tormanr: Tides of Numenera is a spiritual successor to Planescape Torment
